column1: #Text=[0226] Briefly, the acquisition module appends data from the six basic tables produced by the SCADA system into the four basic RDA tables.
#Text=The three ten-minute tables are each appended to their own corresponding RDA tables.
#Text=The three error tables are all appended to 10MinErrors.
#Text=[0227] In this process, the circuit ID and the items ID are converted via the appropriate asset query to a system an ID (simply called ID in the tables).
#Text=This ID is then used by all the remaining ERAM functions.
#Text=[0228] This translation process is to maintain compatibility with a PMC style Asset/Resource tracking database.
#Text=Also to insure the ability to link system sites via a WAN (Wide Area Network), each asset (i.e.
#Text=Turbine, Met Station, and Substation (metered circuit with a breaker)) is given a unique ID.

#Text=3 Translation SCADA Table Update Query Query RDA Data Table WTG10MIN ag10MinWtg AssetsWTG 10MinWtg MET10MIN ag10MinMet AssetsMET 10MinMet SUB10MIN ag10MinSub AssetsSUB 10MinSub WTGERR agErrWtg AssetsWTG 10MinErrors BREAKERR agErrBrk AssetsSUB 10MinErrors COMERR agErrCom AssetsAll 10MinErrors
